@notice Calculation of Pot Winner Prize.
 @dev Findout the 50% of the Total Pot and The Winner payment and Calculation of Weekly & Monthly Pot Prizes.

@notice Pay Pot Prize to the Winner.
 @dev Transfer Pot Prize to the Winner.

@notice Remaining Pot Money Transfer.
 @dev Transfer remaining Money to the Weekly Pot, Monthly Pot & Liquidity Pool.

@notice Save The Winner Address for Weekly Lottery
 @dev Update Generator Smart Contract For Saving Hourly Winner Address

devdoc.author: Batis Abhari (https://github.com/baties - ContactMe: abhari_Batis@hotmail.com)

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

planB_VRFDelay().details: Only If after 10 min the VRF Coordinator does not respond This function Change the lWinnerSelected to True so the Last Random Word used instead of a new one .

play().details: Payable Function. This Function is resposible for Accepting new Gamers in Hourly Lottery

potInitialize().details: AtFirst The Hourly Lottery have been Initialized for Default but after each Pot it Must be Initialized for next Pot .

potPause().details: THis Function just Pauses the current Pot Play and Select Winner Routines and Use only for Emergency .

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

select_Winner().details: Hourly Lottery Pot Winner Selection Start Process, This Function Just Called Request Random Number Routine For Communicate with VRF Coordinator.

select_Winner_Continue().details: Hourly Lottery Pot Winner Selection Continue, This Function Only Call after fulfillRandomWords is Called. This Function is responsible for Updating Lottery Data, Pay the Winner Prize & then clear and Release the Memory

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: Core SmartContract for BNB Game Lottery

planB_VRFDelay().notice: This Function is Only a PLan B for When The VRF Coordinator does not respond in a short time .

play().notice: Players' Operation and Calculation after Sending Transaction to the SmartContract.

potPause().notice: Hourly Lottery Pot is Pausable, This is the Trigger.

select_Winner().notice: Hourly Lottery Pot Winner Selection, This Winner is Selected among Hourly Member List.

select_Winner_Continue().notice: Hourly Lottery Pot Winner Selection Continue, This Function Selects The Winner With Random Number Generated.

userdoc.notice: This SmartContract is responsible for implimentation of Lottery Core System and communication with the Players
